level.text: The Chief Financial Officer shall submit a written report to the Mayor and the Council on a quarterly basis on the status of the Fund, including the current balance of the Fund, specifying the amount in each account, and a list of the projects supported by the Fund, specifying the account.
An agency that receives an extension pursuant to § 1-325.151(1)(B) or (2)(B) shall submit an activity report and schedule for completion within 120 days of the start of the extension.
